# Tutorials

<!-- Generated by Copilot -->

> **Learning-oriented guides** - Step-by-step lessons to help you get started

## Available Tutorials

### [Getting Started](GETTING_STARTED.md)

**Time**: 30-45 minutes

**Goal**: Set up a complete development environment and understand the basics

A comprehensive walkthrough that takes you from zero to a running service:

- Prerequisites installation
- Project setup with git submodules
- Database configuration
- Running your first migration
- Starting the service
- Exploring the API with Swagger

**Best for**: New team members, first-time setup

---

### [Quick Start with Docker](QUICK_START_DOCKER.md)

**Time**: 5-10 minutes

**Goal**: Get the service running quickly using Docker

Fast-track setup using Docker Compose:

- One-command service startup
- Pre-configured dependencies
- Quick verification
- Ready for development

**Best for**: Quick demos, trying out the service, Docker users

---

## Tutorial Principles

Our tutorials follow these principles:

✅ **Learning-oriented**: Focus on teaching, not just doing

✅ **Hands-on**: You build something real

✅ **Progressive**: Each step builds on the previous

✅ **Reproducible**: Same steps = same result

✅ **Beginner-friendly**: No assumed knowledge

## What Tutorials Are NOT

❌ Tutorials are not reference material (see [Reference](../reference/))

❌ Tutorials are not problem-solving guides (see [How-To](../how-to/))

❌ Tutorials are not explanation (see [Explanation](../explanation/))
